RECOMMENDATION 6: Cord care
Daily chlorhexidine (7.1% chlorhexidine digluconate aqueous solution or gel, 
delivering 4% chlorhexidine) application to the umbilical cord stump during the first 
week of life is recommended for newborns who are born at home in settings with 
high neonatal mortality (30 or more neonatal deaths per 1000 live births).
